text: Dance Mode! is the second soundtrack album with music from the Australian TV show Bluey. It was released by Demon Records. It released on April 21, 2023. It was composed by Joff Bush, who also made the songs for the TV show. ==Track listing== ==Charts== Chart performance for Dance Mode! Chart (2023) Peak position Australian Albums (ARIA) 7 US Top Album Sales (Billboard) 51 US Independent Albums (Billboard) 41 US Kid Albums (Billboard) 1 US Soundtracks (Billboard) 6 ==References== Category:2023 albums
title: Dance Mode!
